global.title: TUMApply
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

register.noaccount: You don't have an account yet?

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 4 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

error.minLength: This field is required to be at least {{ min }} characters.
error.maxLength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{ min }} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.
validation.min: This field should be at least {{ min }}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{ max }}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be at least {{ min }} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits and e-mail addresses.

upload.instruction: Click or drag and drop files to here to upload.

tooltip.remove: Remove this file from the upload list
tooltip.delete: Delete this file from the server

confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to submit your application? Once published, further edits will NOT be possible.

tooltip.bachelorDegreeName: Specify the study program of your Bachelor's Degree.
tooltip.bachelorDegreeUniversity: Enter the name of the University where you completed your Bachelor's Degree.
tooltip.bachelorGradingScale: Choose the Grading Scale used for your Bachelor's Degree.
tooltip.bachelorGrade: Enter your final Bachelor's Grade according to your institution's grading system.
tooltip.masterDegreeName: Specify the study program of your Master's Degree.
tooltip.masterDegreeUniversity: Enter the name of the University where you completed your Master's Degree.
tooltip.masterGradingScale: Choose the Grading Scale used for your Master's Degree.
tooltip.masterGrade: Enter your final Master's Grade according to your institution's grading system.

label.motivation: What is your motivation to take this position?
label.experiences: If you already worked in research topics, what are your experiences?

tooltip.desiredStartDate: Choose the preferred Date when you would like to start the position.
tooltip.motivation: Explain how this position aligns with your career plans or research interests.
tooltip.skills: Share your research background in order to help us see how your experience fits the role.
tooltip.experiences: Highlight results or insights that shaped your research experience.

floatlabel.experiences: Discuss previous research projects, theses or publications

sublabel.skills: Why are you a good fit for this program or lab?
sublabel.experiences: Include your role, methods used, key findings, subjects, projects, ...

dialogs.withdrawMessage: Are you sure you want to withdraw this application? Once withdrawn, it will no longer be visible to the professor. This action can NOT be undone!
dialogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this draft? This action can NOT be undone!

error.Size: Field {{ fieldName }} does not meet min/max size requirements!
error.idexists: A new {{ entityName }} cannot already have an ID

file.not.image: File was expected to be an image but was found to be "{{ fileType }}"
